snippet.title: Escape from Rungistan walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Sirius software)
snippet.description:
Escape from Rungistan (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/escape-from-rungistan) was a graphics adventure game published by Sirius software in 1982 for the Apple ][. The player woke up in a jail in Rungistan and must find a way to escape the country.

The game incorporated several real-time elements that also appeared in a later Sirius adventure game called Critical Mass (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YXz9U_I8-is). For instance, if a snake is moving on screen, the player will die if he types in anything.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough! The long play is done with the help from Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - www.textfiles.com
